example.description: Returns a collection of all your VPCs for a region.
Returns the details of the specified VPC.
Returns the collection of VPCs that match the specified filter (that is, have a CIDR that matches the value '10.0.0.0/16'). The CIDR filter must contain the / followed by one or two digits.
Returns the collection of VPCs that match the specified filter (that is, have a CIDR that matches the value '10.0.0.0/16' and are in the state 'available').

Returns the collection of VPCs that match the specified filter. In this example, one or no VPCs are returned since only one VPC in a region can be the default region. More details about default VPCs can be found in the user guide at http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/default-vpc.html.
